t1: Synthetic Data Collection Sheet Regarding Entries and Exits from the Childcare Institution and Specialized Boarding Schools
t3: The primary goal of this data collection is to support the Government of Uzbekistan in transitioning from institutional care to family-type care for children deprived of parental care To achieve this, we aim to build a robust monitoring mechanism at the national level By collecting detailed data, we can inform evidence-based decisions and policies that promote family-based alternatives
t4: Another critical objective is to enhance the quality of services provided to children with disabilities in institutional care By understanding their unique needs and experiences, we can develop targeted interventions and improve their overall well-being Additionally, we seek to explore and promote adequate family-type alternatives for these children
t5: The purpose of this data collection sheet is to comprehensively track the dynamics of children's entries into and exits from child care institutions and boarding schools By capturing essential information, we aim to inform evidence-based decisions, enhance policies, and improve the overall functioning of child care services
t6: PURPOSE: The data collected through this instrument contributes to the understanding of the of the dynamics of children's transitions into and out of residential centers It helps us identify patterns, trends, and potential areas of concern or improvement
t7: How to complete: This questionnaire is to be completed individually for each institution operating at the time of the research (1 January 2024)
t9: Responsible for completion: the head of the institutions, coordinator or a person authorized by them
t14: Name, patronymics, and surname of the person who filled in the questionnaire
t25: Name of the specialized educational institution
t31: The code of the administrative-territorial unit (МҲОБТ)
t40: Please select one of the following codes
t44: 13 Muruvvat house for children with disabilities
t46: 21 Type I-II for deaf or with hearing impairments children
t47: 22 Type III-IV for blind or visually impaired children
t48: 23 Type V for children with severe speech impairments
t49: 24 Type VI for children with musculoskeletal disorders
t50: 25 Type VII for children with children with slow mental development/mental disorders
t51: 26 Type VIII for children with intellectual disabilities
t52: 2 ENTRIES AND EXITS FROM THIS INSTITUTION BETWEEN JANUARY 1 AND DECEMBER 31 OF THE REFERENCE YEAR
t54: Total number of children in this institution, on December 31, the year before the reference year
t56: Have there been any entries (by any means) in this institution between January 1, 2023 and December 31 of the reference year?
t60: Number of entries in this institution during the reference year
t75: Total entries in this institution during the reference year
t77: New Entries in the child alternative care system / specialized boarding schools system
t84: Entries from maternity/hospital or child found
t86: Entries of children in other situations
t88: New entries into the system - Total
t95: Entries as transfers from Children's home (Baby home)
t97: Entries as transfers from Mehribonlik house
t99: Entries as transfers from Muruvvat house for children with disabilities
t101: Entries as transfers from family-type children homes
t109: Entries as transfers from other childcare institutions
t111: Entries in this institution by transfers (number of children)
t114: Have there been exits (by any means) from this institution between January 1, 2023 and December 31 of the reference year?
t132: Exits of young people 18 years or older
t134: Total number of exits from this institution during the reference year
t145: Reaching the age of 18+ (situations not found among the above)
t147: Finishing secondary education (for boarding school only)
t151: Transfers to other alternative services for children
t162: Transfers to Muruvvat house for children with disabilities
t166: Transfers to other specialized boarding schools
t172: Transfers to other alternative services for children - Total
t173: Transfers to services for adults and other ways of exit
t184: The total number of children in this institution on December 31st, the reference year
